org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.reservation

类 CapacityReservationSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.service.AbstractService

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.hadoop.service.Service, Recoverable, ReservationSystem

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value="yarn")
 @InterfaceStability.Unstable
public class CapacityReservationSystem
extends AbstractReservationSystem
    This is the implementation of ReservationSystem based on the CapacityScheduler

                  throws org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnException
        从接口复制的说明: ReservationSystem
        Re-initialize the ReservationSystem.
        指定者:
        reinitialize 在接口中 ReservationSystem
        覆盖:
        reinitialize 在类中 AbstractReservationSystem
        参数:
        conf - configuration
        rmContext - current context of the ResourceManager
        抛出:
        org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnException - if initialization of the configured plan fails
